content.name: blog-title
content.content: 8 Reasons AngularJS is Awesome and why you should care about it

content.name: meta-description
content.content: Adam Johnstone check's out why AngularJS is a framework that's creating a lot of buzz in the tech industry and is reports on why he's annoyed that some people don't care enough about it.

content.name: more-text
content.content: AngularJS is awesome! I love it, and I'm going to tell you why you should love it too. Version 2 is well on it's way, and the haters have definetely arrived in full force. So why should you care about it? Well, because more interactive UI
